Ingredients: Flour; Milk; Egg; Sugar; Baking Powder
Recipe: 1. Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl. 2. Add milk and egg, whisk until smooth. 3. Heat a pan and pour batter to form pancakes. 4. Cook until golden brown on both sides.

Ingredients: Egg; Salt; Pepper; Butter
Recipe: 1. Beat eggs with salt and pepper. 2. Heat butter in pan. 3. Pour eggs and cook until set. 4. Fold and serve.

Ingredients: Spaghetti; Minced Meat; Tomato; Onion; Garlic; Olive Oil
Recipe: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package. 2. Sauté onion and garlic. 3. Add minced meat and brown. 4. Add tomatoes and simmer 15 min. 5. Serve sauce over spaghetti.

Ingredients: Bread; Cheese; Butter
Recipe: 1. Butter bread slices. 2. Place cheese between slices. 3. Grill until cheese melts and bread is golden. 4. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Chicken; Onion; Tomato; Garlic; Ginger; Spices
Recipe: 1. Marinate chicken with spices for 1 hour. 2. Sauté onions, garlic, ginger. 3. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. 4. Add chicken and simmer 25-30 min until done.

Ingredients: Chicken; Rice; Yogurt; Spices; Onion; Saffron
Tips: Marinate meat and cook on low flame
Recipe: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 1 hour. 2. Fry onions until golden. 3. Partially cook rice. 4. Layer chicken and rice, sprinkle saffron water. 5. Cook on low flame for 20-25 min.

Ingredients: Paneer; Tomato; Butter; Cream; Spices
Recipe: 1. Sauté onions and tomatoes until soft. 2. Blend into smooth sauce. 3. Cook sauce with butter and spices. 4. Add paneer cubes, simmer 10 min.

Ingredients: Rice; Lentils; Potato; Onion; Spices
Recipe: 1. Soak rice and lentils overnight. 2. Grind to smooth batter. 3. Prepare spiced potato filling. 4. Pour batter on pan, cook thin dosa. 5. Place filling, fold, and serve.

Ingredients: Lentils; Onion; Tomato; Spices; Ghee
Recipe: 1. Boil lentils until soft. 2. Sauté onions, tomatoes, spices in ghee. 3. Pour tempering over dal. 4. Simmer 5 min and serve.

Ingredients: Chickpeas; Onion; Tomato; Spices; Garlic; Ginger
Recipe: 1. Soak chickpeas overnight. 2. Boil until soft. 3. Sauté onions, garlic, ginger, and spices. 4. Add chickpeas, simmer 15-20 min. 5. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Chicken; Yogurt; Spices; Lemon
Recipe: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 2 hours. 2. Preheat oven or grill. 3. Cook chicken until fully done and slightly charred. 4. Serve with lemon wedges.

Ingredients: Lamb; Yogurt; Onion; Spices; Garlic; Ginger
Recipe: 1. Sear lamb pieces until browned. 2. Sauté onions, garlic, ginger, and spices. 3. Add lamb and yogurt, simmer 60-70 min until tender. 4. Serve with rice or naan.

Ingredients: Rice; Lentils; Fenugreek
Recipe: 1. Soak rice and lentils with fenugreek overnight. 2. Grind to smooth batter. 3. Ferment batter 8-12 hours. 4. Pour into idli molds and steam 10-12 min. 5. Serve with chutney or sambar.

Ingredients: Lentils; Tamarind; Vegetables; Spices
Recipe: 1. Boil lentils until soft. 2. Add tamarind extract and vegetables. 3. Cook with sambar powder for 15-20 min. 4. Serve hot with rice or idli.

Ingredients: Spinach; Paneer; Onion; Tomato; Garlic; Spices
Recipe: 1. Blanch spinach and grind to puree. 2. Sauté onions, garlic, tomatoes, spices. 3. Add spinach puree and cook 5 min. 4. Add paneer cubes and simmer 5-10 min.

Ingredients: Flour; Yogurt; Yeast; Butter
Recipe: 1. Mix flour, yogurt, yeast, and knead into dough. 2. Let dough rise 1 hour. 3. Roll dough and cook on hot pan or tandoor. 4. Brush with butter and serve.

Ingredients: Chicken; Rice; Egg; Soy Sauce; Peas; Carrot
Recipe: 1. Cook rice and let it cool. 2. Sauté chicken and vegetables. 3. Add beaten eggs and cook. 4. Add rice and soy sauce, stir-fry 5-7 min.

Ingredients: Carrot; Potato; Peas; Onion; Spices; Coconut Milk
Recipe: 1. Sauté onions and spices. 2. Add vegetables and cook 10-15 min. 3. Pour coconut milk and simmer 10 min. 4. Serve hot with rice.

Ingredients: Rice; Egg; Carrot; Peas; Soy Sauce
Recipe: 1. Heat oil in pan. 2. Add carrots and peas, sauté 2 min. 3. Add beaten eggs and scramble. 4. Add rice and soy sauce, stir-fry 5 min.

Ingredients: Pasta; Cheese; Milk; Butter; Flour
Recipe: 1. Cook pasta and drain. 2. Make cheese sauce with butter, flour, and milk. 3. Add cheese and stir until melted. 4. Mix pasta with sauce and serve.

Ingredients: Broccoli; Carrot; Bell Pepper; Soy Sauce; Garlic
Recipe: 1. Heat oil in wok. 2. Add garlic and vegetables. 3. Stir-fry 5-7 min. 4. Add soy sauce and serve hot.

Ingredients: Tomato; Onion; Garlic; Cream; Salt; Pepper
Recipe: 1. Sauté onions and garlic. 2. Add chopped tomatoes and cook 10 min. 3. Blend to smooth. 4. Add cream and simmer 5 min. 5. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Flour; Sugar; Cocoa; Egg; Butter; Baking Powder
Recipe: 1. Mix dry ingredients. 2. Add wet ingredients and whisk. 3. Pour batter into greased pan. 4. Bake 30-35 min at 180°C. 5. Cool and serve.

Ingredients: Lettuce; Croutons; Parmesan; Caesar Dressing
Recipe: 1. Chop lettuce. 2. Add croutons and parmesan. 3. Pour dressing and toss. 4. Serve chilled.

Ingredients: Tortilla; Minced Meat; Lettuce; Tomato; Cheese
Recipe: 1. Cook minced meat with spices. 2. Heat tortillas. 3. Fill tortillas with meat, lettuce, tomato, and cheese. 4. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Pasta; Cream; Parmesan; Butter; Garlic
Recipe: 1. Cook pasta and drain. 2. Heat butter and garlic. 3. Add cream and parmesan, stir to make sauce. 4. Toss pasta with sauce and serve.

Ingredients: Egg; Cream; Bacon; Cheese; Pie Crust
Recipe: 1. Pre-bake crust. 2. Sauté bacon and mix with eggs and cream. 3. Pour filling into crust. 4. Bake 30 min at 180°C. 5. Cool and serve.

Ingredients: Tomato; Cucumber; Onion; Olive; Feta; Olive Oil
Recipe: 1. Chop vegetables and olives. 2. Add feta cubes. 3. Drizzle olive oil and toss. 4. Serve chilled.

Ingredients: Bread; Chicken; Lettuce; Tomato; Mayo
Recipe: 1. Cook chicken slices. 2. Toast bread. 3. Assemble sandwich with lettuce, tomato, chicken, and mayo. 4. Serve immediately.

Ingredients: Fish; Tortilla; Cabbage; Lime; Mayo
Tips: Use fresh fish for best taste
Recipe: 1. Cook fish with spices. 2. Heat tortillas. 3. Fill tortillas with fish, cabbage, lime juice, and mayo. 4. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Lasagna Sheets; Minced Meat; Tomato Sauce; Cheese; Bechamel
Recipe: 1. Cook meat and tomato sauce. 2. Layer lasagna sheets, meat sauce, and cheese. 3. Repeat layers and top with bechamel. 4. Bake 35-40 min at 180°C. 5. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Banana; Flour; Sugar; Egg; Butter
Recipe: 1. Mash bananas. 2. Mix with flour, sugar, egg, and butter. 3. Pour batter into greased pan. 4. Bake 50-55 min at 175°C. 5. Cool and slice.

Ingredients: Chicken; Flour; Egg; Bread Crumbs; Oil
Tips: Use medium heat to cook evenly
Recipe: 1. Cut chicken into bite-size pieces. 2. Coat with flour, egg, and breadcrumbs. 3. Fry in oil until golden. 4. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Pasta; Bacon; Egg; Parmesan; Pepper
Tips: Use hot pasta to cook eggs
Recipe: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Fry bacon until crisp. 3. Mix eggs and parmesan. 4. Toss hot pasta with egg mixture and bacon. 5. Serve immediately.

Ingredients: Carrot; Potato; Peas; Onion; Spices; Coconut Milk
Recipe: 1. Sauté onions and spices. 2. Add vegetables and cook 10-15 min. 3. Add coconut milk and simmer 5-10 min. 4. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Rice; Mushroom; Onion; Butter; Parmesan; Stock
Recipe: 1. Sauté onions and mushrooms. 2. Add rice and toast 2 min. 3. Add stock gradually, stir until rice is creamy. 4. Add parmesan and serve.

Ingredients: Beef; Tortilla; Lettuce; Tomato; Cheese
Recipe: 1. Cook beef with spices. 2. Heat tortillas. 3. Fill with beef, lettuce, tomato, and cheese. 4. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Chicken; Bell Pepper; Onion; Tortilla; Spices
Recipe: 1. Marinate chicken in spices. 2. Sauté chicken and vegetables. 3. Heat tortillas. 4. Fill with chicken and vegetables. 5. Serve immediately.

Ingredients: Bell Pepper; Rice; Minced Meat; Tomato; Cheese
Recipe: 1. Hollow bell peppers. 2. Mix cooked rice and meat. 3. Stuff peppers and top with cheese. 4. Bake 20-25 min at 180°C. 5. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Pasta; Cheese; Milk; Butter; Flour
Recipe: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Make cheese sauce. 3. Combine pasta and sauce. 4. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Chicken; Carrot; Celery; Onion; Stock; Noodles
Recipe: 1. Boil chicken in stock. 2. Add vegetables and cook 15 min. 3. Add noodles and cook until done. 4. Serve warm.

Ingredients: Bread; Butter; Garlic; Parsley
Recipe: 1. Mix butter, garlic, and parsley. 2. Spread on bread slices. 3. Bake 10 min at 180°C. 4. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Tuna; Lettuce; Tomato; Onion; Mayo
Recipe: 1. Mix tuna with chopped vegetables and mayo. 2. Chill 10 min. 3. Serve cold.

Ingredients: Chocolate; Flour; Sugar; Egg; Butter
Recipe: 1. Melt chocolate and butter. 2. Mix with sugar and eggs. 3. Add flour and fold. 4. Bake 25-30 min at 180°C. 5. Cool and cut.

Ingredients: Pasta; Zucchini; Tomato; Olive Oil; Garlic
Recipe: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Sauté zucchini and garlic. 3. Toss pasta with vegetables and olive oil. 4. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Minced Meat; Breadcrumbs; Egg; Onion; Spices
Recipe: 1. Mix meat with breadcrumbs, egg, onion, and spices. 2. Form balls and bake or fry 15-20 min. 3. Serve with sauce.

Ingredients: Chicken; Olive Oil; Garlic; Herbs
Recipe: 1. Preheat oven. 2. Rub chicken with oil, garlic, and herbs. 3. Roast 45-60 min. 4. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Minced Meat; Potato; Carrot; Peas; Onion; Butter
Recipe: 1. Cook meat with vegetables. 2. Top with mashed potato. 3. Bake 20-25 min at 180°C. 4. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Flour; Milk; Egg; Butter; Sugar
Recipe: 1. Mix flour, milk, egg, sugar. 2. Pour thin batter in pan. 3. Cook both sides. 4. Fill and serve.

Ingredients: Beef; Kidney Beans; Tomato; Onion; Chili Powder
Recipe: 1. Sauté onion and beef. 2. Add beans, tomato, and chili powder. 3. Simmer 20-25 min. 4. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Egg; Rice; Onion; Peas; Soy Sauce
Recipe: 1. Heat oil. 2. Sauté onion and peas. 3. Add eggs and scramble. 4. Add rice and soy sauce, stir-fry 5 min.

Ingredients: Pasta; Basil; Garlic; Pine Nuts; Parmesan; Olive Oil
Tips: Reserve pasta water for smooth sauce
Recipe: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Blend basil, garlic, pine nuts, parmesan, olive oil. 3. Toss pasta with pesto. 4. Serve immediately.

Ingredients: Carrot; Potato; Peas; Onion; Spices; Coconut Milk
Recipe: 1. Sauté onions and spices. 2. Add vegetables and cook 10-15 min. 3. Add coconut milk and simmer 5-10 min. 4. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Chicken; Rice; Yogurt; Spices; Onion; Saffron
Tips: Marinate meat and cook on low flame
Recipe: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 1 hour. 2. Fry onions until golden. 3. Partially cook rice. 4. Layer chicken and rice, sprinkle saffron water. 5. Cook on low flame for 20-25 min.

Ingredients: Paneer; Tomato; Butter; Cream; Spices
Recipe: 1. Sauté onions and tomatoes until soft. 2. Blend into smooth sauce. 3. Cook sauce with butter and spices. 4. Add paneer cubes, simmer 10 min.

Ingredients: Rice; Lentils; Potato; Onion; Spices
Recipe: 1. Soak rice and lentils overnight. 2. Grind to smooth batter. 3. Prepare spiced potato filling. 4. Pour batter on pan, cook thin dosa. 5. Place filling, fold, and serve.
